sentence.Network_en: Programme-makers seem irresponsibly insouciant about churning out violence.
sentence.Network_cn: 编程者似乎对大批量制造含暴力因素的产品处之漠然，毫无责任心。

sentence.Network_en: In fact, I found him personally likable, if irresponsibly impulsive.
sentence.Network_cn: 说实在的, 我发现,这个人还很可爱, 虽然有些不负责任地过于任性了.

sentence.Network_en: He had been coming and going , for the past year, so comfortably and irresponsibly.
sentence.Network_cn: 一年来, 他随心所欲,无所顾忌地进进出出.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 7单元-raul 7-搜狐博客 ... responsibly 负责人地 irresponsibly 不负责任地 be responsible for sth 对某事负责.
someone acting freely or even irresponsibly ., 一个行动自由甚至不负责任者.
It makes people act irresponsibly ., 它使人们做事不负责任.

社会本位 standard of society无责任行为 irresponsible right正当防卫 justifiable right; ligitimate defence.
瞎_百度百科 ... ⒔ 瞎三话四[ reckless talk] ⒕ 瞎说[ talk irresponsibly] ⒖ 瞎眼[ blind].
“说”字... ... 说不过去[ unacceptable to one's sense of propriety of justice] 说长道短[ talk irresponsibly] 说穿[ reveal].
His father is an irresponsible drunkard ., 他父亲是个不负责任的醉汉.

entry.tran: 不负责任的;无责任感的
entry.def: If you describe someone as irresponsible, you are criticizing them because they do things without properly considering their possible consequences.

example.ex: I felt that it was irresponsible to advocate the legalisation of drugs...
example.tran: 我认为鼓吹毒品合法化是不负责任的行为。

example.ex: It would be irresponsible of me not to advise my company to abandon this project...
example.tran: 若我不建议公司放弃这个项目，那我就是不负责任。

auth_sentence.content: Cosmetic surgery clinics behaved as irresponsibly as banks.

auth_sentence.content: Corporations are wasting huge amounts of energy and irresponsibly release toxins into water supplies.
